definitions.definition: Referring or belonging to the Gurkha people.
examples: The Gurkha royal house of Shah united all Nepal under its rule

definitions.definition: Referring or belonging to Gurkha soldiers.
examples: In 2009, Gurkha veterans were awarded better terms in the UK

main_definition: Referring or belonging to the Gurkha people.
secondary_definitions: Referring or belonging to Gurkha soldiers.
